name: Bush Fire Department
description: The Bush Fire Department provides fire protection and emergency services to the Bush community in London, Kentucky. They operate 24/7 emergency response services and maintain multiple fire stations in the area. The department serves as a government organization providing essential public safety services.
source: Verified from official Bush Fire Department Facebook page and Google search results
hours_of_operation: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for emergency services
eligibility_requirements: Emergency services available to all residents in service area
populations_served: Residents of Bush community and surrounding areas in London, Kentucky
cost_information: Emergency services provided at no cost to residents
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2025-01-27. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from official Bush Fire Department Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/p/Bush-Fire-Department-100057405072081/. Address and phone number confirmed from Facebook page: 60 Marydell Road, London, KY 40741-8619, Phone: (606) 864-6663, Email: bushfiredept@bushfd.net. Additional location information verified from Google search results showing multiple stations including Station #3 at 733-1165 E Laurel Rd. Website listed as bushfiredepartment.com but appears to be non-functional. Department operates as government organization providing 24/7 emergency fire protection services. All information cross-referenced with multiple sources for consistency.
